channel.title: Error crashes server. Help maybe?
channel.description:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.createFrameVarSize(stream.java:160) at client.sendMessage(client.java:9046) at client.PKz(client.java:19983) at client.ApplyDead(client.java:20067) at client.ApplyDead(client.java:20057) at client.Poison(client.java:6879) at client.process(client.java:13690) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:47)[/code]
This crashes my server. Please help me out. Thanks.
